muclient.script:
dim jfwobject dim speak 'do we want to speak? dim history 'previous lines
sub toggleSpeaking (name, line, wc) if speak = 1 then speak = 0 jfwobject.sayString "jfw auto speak off.", 0 else speak = 1 jfwobject.sayString "jfw auto speak on.",0 end if end sub
sub speakHistory (name, line, wildcards) if (t = 0 or t = 1) and speak = 1 then jfwobject.sayString history(wildcards(1)), 0 end if end sub
sub OnPluginInstall set jfwobject = CreateObject("jfwapi") jfwobject.sayString "jfw speech is ready to rock!",0 speak = 1 history = Array("a","b","c","d","e","f","g","h","i") end sub
sub OnPluginScreendraw (t, log, line) if (t = 0 or t = 1) and speak = 1 then jfwobject.sayString line, 0 pushHistory(line) end if end sub
sub OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if msg = 222 then jfwobject.sayString text,0 pushHistory(text) end if end sub
sub pushHistory(value)
' shuffle items For count = 7 to 0 step - 1 history(count + 1) = history(count) Next
history(0) = value
end sub
